name: sap.watt.ideplatform.debug.core.service.extension.DocumentProvider
description: A document provider returns the source code representation for a particular runtime resource. A runtime resource is only accessible while some associated debug session exists. Resources that are located in the workspace are retrieved by the debug framework itself using the Web IDE's filesystem service.

getDocumentByModelElement.description: Returns the source document that corresponds to the given model element, or null if a source document could not be located.

params.name: element
params.description: The model element for which to locate the source.

returns.description: The source document in read-only or writable state.
